ygData.subject: Re: Some questions
ygData.msgSnippet: I had that happen the other night in Solusek.  Couldn t help but get too close and got myself and half the gobs in the room resisted.  I use the area mes
ygData.messageBody:
I had that happen the other night in Solusek. Couldn't help but get too
close and got myself and half the gobs in the room resisted. I use the area
mes sparingly.

In a message dated 12/8/99 6:36:36 AM Pacific Standard Time,
Robert.Farr@... writes:

<< I agree with you on everything except one. If my party is fighting 3 or
more
creatures I don't bother with Enthrall. My mainstay in that case is
mesmerization. I was in a party in Permafrost the other day and the tank
pulled 14(!) assorted ice goblins. There were some hairy moments in that
battle with lack of communication between 2 of the tanks, but then score at
the end was Party:14 Goblins:0. Don't underestimate that AE mesmerize, just
don't stand too close.. hehe. >>
